title: Avira Antivirus Premium 2012 Trial Reset.7z
description:
I am not the creator of this. I just found it on the internet and uploaded it here.






Only the trial reset inside.


You can download the antivirus for free from the official website: <a href="
http://www.avira.com/en/for-home-avira-antivirus-premium" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.avira.com/en/for-home-avira-antivirus-premium</a>


Instructions:

1) Install Avira
2) Select trial period when asked in the end of the installation
3) When trial period is almost over, run the file BOX_ATR2.3
4) Done!



Hope you like it.
Comment if you have any questions or problems. :)
